review: This product failed to meet my expectations in so many way! It worked when plugged to my TV but not when plugged to my audio/video system (which works fine with all my other HDMI devices). The setup failed the first few times and then magically worked. At one point, I had a blank screen and a blinking light, with no information on what was going on. Turned out the device had decided to self-update itself, worst UI ever.

author: kendell

review: I've bought 2 for myself and 1 for my a Christmas gift for a family member. The Chromecast is so fun. I also I have an hdmi cable that I use as a backup when the wifi is spotty. I watch a lot of Youtube videos during the week and Netflix works with Chromecast too. I get to watch movies on my computer and play on my computer at the same time. For the people complaining about not having Amazon Prime and other video services I think they should get Plex. Plex lets you watch movies, tv shows and listen to music on your computer (it's 4 dollars a month and 30 dollars a year). So convenient and I think the screensaver looks cool. Really easy to use and setup.
